thread.title: Quayle Alert: Fed 'Leo' Agent -Asked Wouldn't It Be A Coincidence If The Syrian 'Refugees Brought A Massive Ebola Breakout Into The US? | Immigration
thread.title_full: Quayle Alert: Fed 'Leo' Agent -Asked Wouldn't It Be A Coincidence If The Syrian 'Refugees Brought A Massive Ebola Breakout Into The US? | Immigration

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Quayle Alert: Fed 'Leo' Agent -Asked Wouldn't It Be A Coincidence If The Syrian 'Refugees Brought A Massive Ebola Breakout Into The US? | Immigration
text:
(Before It's News)
Steve Quayle Alert Hey Steve my HQ just sent me an email stating that all law enforcement are going to be issued PPE or personal protective equipment for a possible Ebola exposure event.
Starting the next few weeks all regions will be issued this gear because we are labeled “high risk for exposure” to the virus.
DHS will be issuing infection control personal protection kits ICPPKs and for us to always have our kit on hand….are we expecting an ebola break out?
UPDATED8:15 PM LATER IN THE DAY—It’s so strange that you would send this to me ( THE INFOWARS LINK ON IDAHO). I spoke with a co-worker today about this. I asked, wouldn’t it be a coincidence if the Syrian “refugees” brought a massive ebola break out into the US?
Now Idaho wants an Ebola Coordinator in a place where there are these Syrian “refugees” ..I think you just confirmed my fear of this. Why else would DHS be having us law enforcement guys prepping for such an event?
Especially when they are going to spend hundreds of thousands on these biological suits for us that will include it’s own special mask, that I hope actually works.
Very interesting, God be with us and protect us..http://www.infowars.com/idaho-quietly-seeks-ebola-coordinator/
Oct 23, 2015
http://www.stevequayle.com/index.php?s=33&d=1587
